title: Expecting to see a section for each node type on the start page
gherkin:
When the user visits the start page
Then the page should contain a section for each of the following node types
  | _node_type_   |
  | COMPANY       |
  | BRAND         |
  | CAR MODEL     |
  | RACE TRACK    |
  | TRACK LAYOUT  |
  | RACING SERIES |
  | IMAGE         |
